Thesaurus: Something went wrong while editing the thesaurus.
Synoniemenlijst: Er ging iets mis tijdens het bewerken van de thesaurus.

Thesaurus: Maximum number of thesaurus rules applied at a given time to a given search query to produce alternative queries. That number applies first to the synonyms rules and then the expansion rules. For instance if the setting's value is 2, it means each alternative query will be the result of the application of at most 2 synonyms rules and at most 2 expansion rules. But if you have 10 synonym rules and 5 expansion rules, they could all end up being applied by pairs. So be careful about augmenting this setting's value, especially if you already have a lot of rules with long lists of alternative terms.
Synoniemenlijst: Maximum number of thesaurus rules applied at a given time to a given search query to produce alternative queries. That number applies first to the synonyms rules and then the expansion rules. For instance if the setting's value is 2, it means each alternative query will be the result of the application of at most 2 synonyms rules and at most 2 expansion rules. But if you have 10 synonym rules and 5 expansion rules, they could all end up being applied by pairs. So be careful about augmenting this setting's value, especially if you already have a lot of rules with long lists of alternative terms.

Thesaurus: Maximum number of alternative search queries taken into account. Lower its value if you have "max boolean clauses" errors or performance issues arising on your cluster related to a huge volume of thesaurus rules and/or having the stemming enabled for the thesaurus. Defaults to 50. (Used to default to 0 - no limitation).
Synoniemenlijst: Maximum number of alternative search queries taken into account. Thesaurus: Enable stemming on synonym and expansion rules
Synoniemenlijst: Enable stemming on synonym and expansion rules

Thesaurus:
If enabled, by applying the same stemming behavior that occurs when indexing product data, this will allow search queries to match synonym and expansion rules more broadly with regard to singular and plural forms of words. For instance, for a synonym rule "story,tale", searching either for "story" or "stories" will trigger the synonym and make Elasticsuite also search for "tale". For an expansion rule "sport => football,tennis,soccer,running", searching either for "sport" or "sports" will trigger the expansion and make Elasticsuite also search for "football", "tennis", "soccer" and "running".
If disabled, the legacy stricter matching mode will be applied, where searching for "stories" would not trigger a "story,tale" synonym or searching for "sports" would not trigger a "sport => football,tennis,soccer,running" expansion.
Synoniemenlijst:
Als dit is ingeschakeld, door hetzelfde stamgedrag toe te passen dat optreedt bij het indexeren van productgegevens, hierdoor kunnen zoekopdrachten synoniemen en uitbreidingsregels breder laten overeenkomen met betrekking tot enkelvouds- en meervoudsvormen van woorden. Bijvoorbeeld voor een synoniemregel "verhaal,sprookje", zoeken naar "verhaal" of "verhalen" zal het synoniem activeren en laat Elasticsuite ook zoeken naar "sprookje". Voor een uitbreidingsregel "activiteit => voetbal,tennis,zwemmen,rennen" zal het zoeken naar "activiteit" of "activiteiten" de uitbreiding activeren en laat Elasticsuite ook zoeken naar "voetbal", "tennis", "zwemmen" en "rennen".
Als dit is uitgeschakeld, wordt de oude, striktere matchingmodus toegepast, waar het zoeken naar "verhalen" geen synoniem "verhaal,sprookje" zou activeren of zoeken naar "activiteiten" zou geen uitbreiding van "activiteit => voetbal,tennis,zwemmen,rennen" activeren.
